overview: I’m Georgia Brooker and I work in the business ‘Corgreen’, with my business partner, Danni Cotterill. We are a company who sell healthy Fair Trade snacks in a recycled paper bag, which helps to promote healthy eating and the Earth Charter. With the additional profit made, we adopt animals from the WWF, and so far, we have adopted 3 giants pandas, and hope to adopt many more in the future.
